name: "useless" pong
description:
Use the Up and Down arrows to play.

This game was made as a demonstration project for the Superpowers HTML5 Game Engine. I figured I would post it here because it's complete and it works. You can find the source here.

https://github.com/notexplosive/uselesspong

To import:

1. Download Superpowers

2. Once it's installed, go to %APPDATA%/Superpowers/projects*

3. Drop the repo in that directory.

*Path is different on OSX and Linux. More info at here.
